column5: Relax in our totally remodeled Stilt home. Enjoy complementary coffee. plenty of parking for your boats, covered parking for your vehicles. 4 Blocks from Bluff's Landing Marina. Closest full-service marina to the Laguna Madre, Baffin Bay and the Land cut. 10 minutes to the Beaches & Schlitterbahn. Easy access by boat to the Gulf of Mexico. Bluffs Landing Marina &Reef Restaurant, is a one stop location for, boating,windsurfers, kite surfers, kayaking, wildlife observers & guided fishing.
